about_the_game:
Lucid is a narrative adventure game about Leif – a boring, cowardly and lonely man on a steady track towards defeat and death. A beautiful midsummer night in the tiny northern fishing village Måsnes, Leif wakes up and remembers his dreams for the first time in many years. Is there a connection between his dreams and the real world?

Step into the life of Leif - the world’s least impressive video game hero - who may not even have the power to step out of bed. Explore his tiny comfort zone and use lucid dreaming to reach deep into his subconscious to find a spark of life - or perhaps a final nightmarish madness.


For anyone from experienced gamers to those fresh to the genre and even those new to gaming altogether - the point & click adventure is a time honored genre that is both accessible and engaging.


This Arctic, Nordic and Sámi story is told with dedication by a team of experienced developers from award winning games such as Firewatch, The Longest Journey, Anarchy Online, Age of Conan and Trolls vs. Vikings with a passion for the project. The Norwegian and Sámi team also consist of award winning script writers and one psychologist.

short_description: In a small fishing village in the land of the midnight sun, Leif’s life as a cowardly, lonely and boring man is coming to an end. The only things he has to lose are the dreams he has started having at night. Can he find a spark of life in them - or a final nightmarish madness?
